expertSupport.subtitle: Don't have time to build? Our team sets up, optimizes, and manages your chatbot for you.

q1.question: Can I buy extra messages without upgrading my plan?
q1.answer: Yes! All plans including Free can purchase message credits as add-ons. Buy what you need, when you need it.

q2.question: Do AI tokens expire?
q2.answer: No. AI tokens are one-time purchases with no expiry. Use them at your own pace.

q3.question: What's included in Expert Setup service?
q3.answer: Our team builds your chatbot flows, trains the AI, integrates channels, and tests everything before launch.

q4.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
q4.answer: Yes. Monthly plans can be cancelled anytime with no penalties.

q5.question: What happens if I exceed my message limit?
q5.answer: Your bot continues working but won't send new messages until you top up credits or wait for the next billing cycle.

q6.question: How does the free plan work?
q6.answer: The Free plan gives you 1K contacts and 1K messages per month to test MeaChat with real customers.

q7.question: Do I need technical skills to use MeaChat?
q7.answer: Not at all! MeaChat is designed to be user-friendly with a drag-and-drop flow builder.

q8.question: Is MeaChat compliant with privacy regulations?
q8.answer: Absolutely! MeaChat is fully compliant with GDPR, CCPA, and other major privacy regulations.

q9.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q9.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for annual plans.
